page.title: 18GHOST.
page.content:
Willow the Wisp is a ghost that lurks around marshes and rivers.It appears on misty nights with a glow in its body. Some people think that Willow the Wisp is just a mist forming into the shape of a body with glow-worms or fire-flys as the glow.
The Black dog is a ghost with two red eyes and a spiky collar. If you ever look into the dogs eyes and tell someone before a year is over,you will die by some accident.
The Wherry is a ghost ship called the Mayfly. There is only one big sail. If you see the Wherry, soon after you or one of your relations die. It appears on 24 June at night. There are also two other ghosts called The Man Who Rode The Bike and Mad Monk.
